website_creation_step4_admin_password_er: The two passwords must be identical
The password must contain at least 8 characters
website_creation_step4_explanation: Choose the username, password and language that you want to use to sign in to your website's administrative interface.
website_creation_step5_warning: This will change your configuration and alter the way that your website works if it has already been configured.
website_creation_error: An error has occurred setting up your website.
website_hosting_capabilities_error: An error has occurred retrieving information about your hosting plan.
website_creation_error_quotas: You have reached the maximum number of websites available with your hosting plan.
website_creation_success: Your website is being configured, and will be available in a few minutes.
website_creation_success_done: Your website is correctly configured. Your website is being set up. It should be available within 24 hours. Return home
website_instructions: This wizard will help you set up your website easily. It does not include all the options and settings available. If you want to access advanced options, select the product that you want to configure in the left-hand menu.
website_creation_type_classic_explanatio: I want to upload my website files to my hosting plan myself, via the FTP protocol
website_creation_type_shop_explanation: I want to sell products online, and easily manage my store
website_creation_type_blog_explanation: I want a ready-to-use website, and I don't want to worry about anything other than writing my pages and articles
website_creation_type_email: Has to be a valid email address
website_creation_error_capabilities: You don't have any more space available on this web hosting plan. In order to perform this task, you can boost your service
website_creation_type_classic_config: Your login information (login and FTP password) were sent to you when you ordered your hosting plan.
website_creation_common_password_conditi:
Important: the password must meet the following requirements:
- Minimum {{t0}} characters
- Maximum {{t1}} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must only contain letters and numbers
website_success_text_blog: For your blog/website, we have chosen to deploy the WordPress engine. We believe that is it the easiest solution for you to publish your articles and content.
website_success_text_blog_explanation_1: You will receive and email containing your details when the installation is complete. In the meantime, you can refer to the official WordPress documentation, and start familiarising yourself with your new tool.
website_success_text_classic: You want to set up a website. We have configured your domain {{t0}} and your hosting plan {{t1}} so that everything will work straight away. All you have to do is upload your website to your hosting plan via an FTP client using the following connection details:
website_success_text_classic_welcome: You can also refer to our guide explaining how to get your website online: see guide
website_success_text_shop: You want to set up an e-commerce website. We selected PrestaShop for you due to its simplicity and features, and we are currently deploying it on {{t0}}
website_success_text_shop_explanation_1: When the installation is complete, you will receive an email containing your details. In the meantime, you can take a look at the official PrestaShop documentation, and start familiarising yourself with your new sales tool:
website_success_text_shop_welcome: Welcome to the world of e-commerce.
